definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: The Applications of ESD Safe hot air guns?
sentences.chinese: 防靜電熱風槍的廣泛使用？

sentences.english: Use a hair dryer or heat gun to shrink the teflon tubing.
sentences.chinese: 使用吹風機或熱風槍縮小聚四氟乙烯管材。

sentences.english: Using oven or heat gun to let it shrink.
sentences.chinese: 用烘箱和熱風槍加熱即可收縮。
